actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To amend the Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 to extend and expand the State Trade and Export Promotion (STEP) Grant Program.
short_title: Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2016

summary.text:
Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2016

This bill amends the Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 to reauthorize through FY2019, and increase the authorization of appropriations for, the State Trade and Export Promotion (STEP) Grant Program.

titles.title: Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2016
To amend the Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 to extend and expand the State Trade and Export Promotion (STEP) Grant Program.
